author: cnbc.com
title: Calavo posts 1Q profit
text:
SANTA PAULA, Calif. (AP) _ Calavo Growers Inc. (CVGW) on Wednesday reported fiscal first-quarter earnings of $7.1 million.
The Santa Paula, California-based company said it had net income of 41 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for pretax expenses and non-recurring costs, were 54 cents per share.
The avocado grower posted revenue of $247.9 million in the period.
Calavo shares have risen slightly since the beginning of the year. The stock has climbed 66 percent in the last 12 months.
